text.__SUMMARY__:
Solanum bullatum is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae.
It is endemic to southeastern Brazil, in Atlantic Forest habitats.
It is found in the states of Bahia, Minas Gerais, Paraná, Rio de Janeiro, Santa Catarina, and São Paulo.
text.Sources: Carvalho, L.d'A.F. (1998). "Solanum bullatum". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T37988A10086516. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T37988A10086516.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
